header.title: Account Information
header.subTitle: Please upload all information below. It will make easier for buyers to contact you.

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.inputTitle: It must be 1-20 characters and can only contain letters, hyphens and periods.

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.inputTitle: It must be 1-20 characters and can only contain letters.

titles.title: Title
titles.inputTitle: It must be 1-30 characters and can only contain letters, and comma.

mobile.title: Mobile Number
mobile.inputTitle: It must be 1-21 characters and can only contain numbers, plus, and hyphens.

officeNumber.title: Office Phone
officeNumber.inputTitle: It must be 1-21 characters and can only contain numbers, plus, and hyphens.

confirm.title: Confirm and Save
confirm.subTitle: Please confirm the information above before you save it. All information will be updated immediately.

password.title: New password
password.subTitle: Use at least one letter, one numeral, and eight characters.

alert.8001: Your new passwords did not match. Please try again.
alert.8002: Your password must at least 8 characters. Please try again.
alert.8003: Your old password was incorrect. Please try again.
alert.8004: Password update failed": Internal server error. Please try again.

drop.subTitle: Could you tell us why you want to stop using the service?
drop.placeholder: If you tell us the reason why you want to delete the account, we will do our best to improve the service to make users happy.

caution.title: What happens when a user delete account.
caution.second: No more appears in the search result.
caution.third: Your domain could be taken by someone else.
caution.forth: There could be some disadvantages when you signup again.

deleteConfirm.subTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteConfirm.success: Your account has been deleted successfully. Thank you for using Factory Hunt so far.
